name: Be Brave (SabrinaP)
description:
A young girl finds herself in a gloomy train being chased by a vampiric phantom. She must make her way to the front of the train, jumping and dashing her way through obstacles, and explore the train cars to put together the pieces that will help her work through her fears and journey ever forward.

Controls:

Jump: space / middle mouse button / A on gamepad

Dash/Crouch: shift / left click mouse / X on gamepad

Fast crouch: ctrl / right click mouse / B on gamepad

Made for the game jam FemPowerUp 2022.

Alba Lupiañez Ayala - 3D art - character art - animation

Rosa María García Ortega - Level design - narrative designer

Gemma María Rull - Level design - production

Itziar Carrasco - Concept art - 2D

Lisy Moreno - Concept art  - 2D

Ivet Macias Bugarin - Character art

Dina Sanchez Zapata - Environment artist - animation

Sabrina Purswani - Programmer - animation
